erDiagram
    USER {
        int id PK
        string clerkId UK
        string fullName
        string username UK
        string password
        boolean isAdmin
        string gender
        string email UK
        datetime birthdate
        string occupation
        string location

    ELECTION {
        int id PK
        string title
        string description
        datetime start_date
        datetime end_date
        boolean is_active
        string target_occupation
        string target_location
        datetime birthdate_min
        datetime birthdate_max
        string target_gender

    }

    POLL_CANDIDATES {
        int id PK
        int poll_id FK
        int user_id FK
        datetime invited_at
    }

    VOTE {
        int id PK
        int userId FK
        int electionId FK
        int candidateId FK
        datetime votedAt
    }

    TAKEPART {
        int electionId PK,FK
        int candidateId PK,FK
        int numberOfVotes
    }

    ELECTION ||--o{ VOTE : "receives_votes"
